mapper.select: select rownum as rnum, notice_no as noticeNo, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_writer as noticeWriter, notice_content as noticeContent, notice_date as noticeDate from (select rownum as rnum,n.*from(select * from notice order by 1 desc)n) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select notice_no as noticeNo, notice_title as noticeTitle, notice_writer as noticeWriter, notice_content as noticeContent, notice_date as noticeDate from notice where notice_no=#{parameter}
select notice_file_no as noticeFileNo, notice_no as noticeNo, filename, filepath from notice_file where notice_no=#{parameter}
mapper.insert: insert into notice values( notice_seq.nextval, #{noticeTitle}, 'admin', #{noticeContent}, sysdate )
